skills.name: Typhon - Cluster Missiles
skills.description: Launches homing missiles at multiple targets. Longer charge time. Slightly decreased DMG when hitting the same target multiple times.1st Sequence: 3 missiles.2nd Sequence: 7 missiles.3rd Sequence: 15 missiles.Missile hits have a 10% chance to stun / paralyze / freeze the target for 2s and deal an additional 1,333 Fire / Lightning / Ice DMG.

skills.name: Time Trap
skills.description: [SP: 18][CD: 24s] Rips open a Time Trap field in front of the character. Enemies within the AOE suffer Time Slow and 50% reduced DEF for 6.20s.
